EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed - 2018 Honeywell NBAA Breakout Sessions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming event. We'd like to confirm that you have successfully registered for the following event: {{lead.Question 1:default=edit me}}
Orlando Convention Center, Room S310E
View breakout session details <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018_NBAA_BreakoutSession.html]]>.
We look forward to meeting you!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
